attributes.action: Ask or persuade British Airways not to sell Concorde
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the prime minister speaks to british airways about the sale of concorde, BA are more likely going to listen and cooperate with the prime minister than anybody else.

Concorde was designed and paid for by british tax payers and now british airways are planning on selling the supersonic aircraft, so that it can sit next to the QE2 in dubai.

We used to be a country of great things producing marvels of engineering that shocked the world. We produced Concorde with the French, but it still represents British brilliance.

So please sign this petition and help put our last engineering oligarchpiece back where it belongs,and that is where it used to stand at London Heathrow Airport.

After All, British taxpayers and not British Airways, paid for its development. Help make Britain great again by keeping Concorde in Great Britain.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
